name: The Twenty One Pilots Bible
description:
- EARLY DEVELOPMENT -

CALL1NG ALL BAND1T0S

So I have absolutely no clue where I got this idea. Basically I just like woke up and was like "I wanna put all twenty one pilots lyrics into a bible!" and this is the beginning of a hopefully great final result.

I have currently finished No Phun Intended and am starting Self Titled.

Apologies for marking this Itch project as a Game instead of a Book. Nobody goes onto Itch to find books and I wanted the Banditos to find me easily.
